verses.roman:
sarala vyavahāra, kare mānera poṣaṇa
kimvā solluṇṭha-vākye kare priya-nirasana

synonyms: sarala vyavahāra—plain dealings; kare—does; mānera—of jealous anger; poṣaṇa—maintenance; kimvā—or; solluṇṭha—smiling a little; vākye—by words; kare—does; priya—of the lover; nirasana—refutation.
translation: "The sober heroine is very simple in her behavior. She keeps her jealous anger within her heart, but with mild words and smiles she refutes the advances of her lover.
